oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bell Echoes publication, December, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The 1940 (December) issue of “Bell Echoes,” published via the Tennessee Accounting Department, of the Southern Bell Telephone Company. This publication features chiefly photographs and articles about staff and officials of the telephone industry. Forms part of the Mary Lane Stain Collection. 1 publication.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Southern Bell Telephone and Telegraph Company--History--Sources
